parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear final drive unit can cause the rear wheel to lock up, leading to a loss of control and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries. Additionally, the oil leak from the failed unit can contaminate the rear brake pads and tire, further increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Sudden failure of the rear final drive unit
oil leaking from the unit
oil covering the rear tire and brake pads
rear wheel slipping or locking up
inability to control the motorcycle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Cracking of Lower Aluminum Fork Legs on BMW F650 GS Motorcycle
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the lower aluminum fork legs can lead to total failure while the motorcycle is in use on public roads, resulting in severe consequences, including accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Cracking or fractures in the lower aluminum fork legs
potentially leading to complete failure of the fork leg.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the rear drive bearing can cause damage to other components, leading to premature wear and potentially causing accidents or leaving the rider stranded.
symptoms: Unusual noises or vibrations from the rear drive
difficulty shifting gears
or complete failure of the rear drive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS modulator can cause the brakes to become inoperable, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents, especially on dirt roads or low-traction surfaces.
symptoms: The brakes fail to respond when the ABS is engaged
the brakes do not slow down the vehicle
the brakes do not work even when the brake pedal and hand lever are applied with maximum force
the ABS system quits working completely
error codes indicate a stuck piston in the ABS modulator.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Release Agent Causing Loss of Traction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The presence of a release agent on the tire surface can cause a loss of traction, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden and unexpected loss of control
sliding or skidding
difficulty steering
unusual tire noise or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the tire belt from the tire can cause a sudden and catastrophic loss of air pressure, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Unusual tire noise or vibrations
sudden loss of air pressure
tire blowout
loss of control
difficulty steering.
